localize.title: Buzzing on Product Hunt
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Product Hunt in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: People have always wanted server-specific P2P or group DMs in Discord. This one feature has been a deal-breaker, which keeps people away from using Discord and settling for Slack. We are here to change that. Add P2P, group DMs like Slack to personal servers.
blogPost.body: People have always wanted server-specific P2P or group DMs in Discord. This one feature has been a deal-breaker, which keeps people away from using Discord and settling for Slack. We are here to change that. Add P2P, group DMs like Slack to personal servers.
blogPost.title: Dispatch - Rooms, groups & P2P DMs in Discord
blogPost.author: Ansh Agarwal
